DOC.brief_title: A Mindfulness Mobile Intervention Targeting Reductions Food Cravings
DOC.detailed_description: In prospective repeated-measures cohort study , participant complete 5-week smartphone app-based intervention teach mindful eating skill . The investigator assess psychological behavioral intervention target use questionnaire brief mobile assessment . The investigator also measure BMI adiposity . Assessments occur pre-intervention , post-intervention , 1 2 month post intervention . At several time study , participant also receive multiple daily text message ask complete brief food crave assessment phone . This `` experience sampling '' approach critical allow investigator capture experience behavior often brief automatic , make poorly suit traditional retrospective questionnaire . The investigator also assess acceptability continue use app via anonymous usage log . Overall , aim 1 ) ass feasibility protocol , 2 ) ass change food craving indulgence craving , 3 ) determine extent participant remain engaged app complete 5-week intervention period whether predicts maintenance benefit 1 month 2 month post-intervention . An exploratory aim measure effect intervention body weight , bodyfat , bodyfat distribution .
